name: BeeFense
description: Protect your bee hive fortress against the hornet menace by building the best Bee defense: a BeeFense! Command your Bees to get beesy. Let them collect honey - the most precious resource in the world to build your fortress and train heroic Bee fieldrunners.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Atom x7 Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 300 MB available space
